ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that all Evaluating fields are filled before we can update the Opportunity stage to Business Evaluation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(contains( $Profile.Name, "Sales"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Startup")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Pro")), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Expansion"),
OR( ISBLANK(Technical_Decision_Owner__c), ISBLANK(Technical_Blockers__c)
), CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), "Business"),
Stage_Number__c > PRIORVALUE(Stage_Number__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill all "Technical Evaluation" fields before moving Stage to Business Evaluation.
